name: Furfly
description: Help the little furry friend to escape the evil swamp and get back to his world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, or 10 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: The game is an arcade/indie which is very fun to play! Smooth control avoiding the traps with the Furfly makes the game experience very satisfying . The levels are well designed and advancing through the game they become more challenging. Intuitive choice for contrast colors (white/black) that highlights exactly what needs to be avoided, makes this game different and in some aspects unique. I recomend it for sure! Totally worth the buy . 10/10
